name: yttracker
author: Thomas Couchoud <zerderr@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Rakambda/)
description: This extension will track your time on YouTube

scripts.clean: npm run removeTempDirectory && node deploy/removeFile.js chromeExtension.zip && node deploy/removeFile.js firefoxExtension.xpi
scripts.copyLibraries: node deploy/copyFolder.js node_modules/bootstrap/dist temp/lib/bootstrap && node deploy/copyFolder.js node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/cjs/popper.js temp/lib/popper.js && node deploy/copyFolder.js node_modules/dropbox/dist temp/lib/dropbox && node deploy/copyFolder.js node_modules/jquery/dist temp/lib/jquery
scripts.chromeBuild: npm run removeTempDirectory && npm run createTempDirectory && npm run copyLibraries && npm run copyIncludes && node deploy/copyFolder.js chrome temp && npm run replaceManifestVersion
scripts.chromeBuildBeta: npm run removeTempDirectory && npm run createTempDirectory && npm run copyLibraries && npm run copyIncludes && node deploy/copyFolder.js chrome temp && node deploy/copyFolder.js chromeBeta temp && npm run replaceManifestVersion
scripts.chromePackage: npm run chromeBuild && npm run removeUselessFilesForStores && node deploy/zipFolder.js chromeExtension.zip temp && npm run removeTempDirectory
scripts.chromePackageBeta: npm run chromeBuildBeta && npm run removeUselessFilesForStores && node deploy/zipFolder.js chromeExtensionBeta.zip temp && npm run removeTempDirectory
scripts.chromeRelease: npm run chromePackage && npm run chromeSend && node deploy/removeFile.js chromeExtension.zip
scripts.firefoxBuild: npm run removeTempDirectory && npm run createTempDirectory && npm run copyLibraries && npm run copyIncludes && node deploy/copyFolder.js firefox temp && npm run replaceManifestVersion
scripts.firefoxPackage: npm run firefoxBuild && npm run removeUselessFilesForStores && node deploy/zipFolder.js firefoxExtension.xpi temp && npm run removeTempDirectory
